author: dantraMSFT
body:
[Feature]
Fix https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/issues/5378
EventResource.resx does not have a generated C# class.

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body: @dantraMSFT the `[Feature]` needs to be put in the commit message, not in the PR description.

comments.author: SteveL-MSFT
comments.body: @dantraMSFT on this branch, just do a `git commit --amended` and update the commit message so that the first line is `[Feature]`, then `git push --force`

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
Something is wrong with the macOS CI. The log shows the build passed, however the CI itself is shown as broken: https://travis-ci.org/PowerShell/PowerShell/jobs/299363616

I will merge this PR.

title: Exclude EventResource.resx from SMAResources.Tests.ps1
